original_title: Naked Hollywood 12: Gonna Find Out Who's Naughty or Nice
overview: Competition. It's a fact of life in the dating game. In Episode #12, our four horny heroines find out just how far they'll go to get the men of their dreams in modern LA. Suspicion, jealousy and scorching sex rule the day!
title: Naked Hollywood 12: Gonna Find Out Who's Naughty or Nice
